attributes.action: wear an eye patch, a tartan cap, and a ginger wig for public appearences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: since the PM is a one eyed scottish idiot, this would suit him (and be quite funny as well!)  Oh and resign while he is at it.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
